text: [Ej musrikon] Ojo oʙ dodan ʙa hocijon va oʙod kardani Mascidu-l-haromro ʙo [imonu amali] kase, ki ʙa Alloh taolo va ruzi vopasin imon ovarda va dar rohi Alloh taolo cihod kardaast, ʙaroʙar medoned? [In du hargiz] Nazdi Alloh taolo ʙaroʙar nestand. Va Alloh taolo sitamgoron [-i musrik]-ro hidojat namekunad
